verses.text: And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* concerning the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

If a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w vow|strong="H5087"\w* a \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, or \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* an \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* to \w bind|strong="H0631"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* with a \w bond|strong="H0632"\w*; he shall not \w break|strong="H2490"\w* his \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, he shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to all that \w proceedeth|strong="H3318"\w* out of his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.\f + \fr 30.2 \ft break: Heb. profane\f*

If a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* also \w vow|strong="H5087"\w* a \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w bind|strong="H0631"\w* herself by a \w bond|strong="H0632"\w*, \add being\add* in her \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in her \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*;

And her \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* her \w vow|strong="H5088"\w*, and her \w bond|strong="H0632"\w* wherewith she hath \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* her \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, and her \w father|strong="H0001"\w* shall hold his \w peace|strong="H2790"\w* at her: then all her \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*, and every \w bond|strong="H0632"\w* wherewith she hath \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* her \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*.

But if her \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w disallow|strong="H5106"\w* her in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that he \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w*; not any of her \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*, or of her \w bonds|strong="H0632"\w* wherewith she hath \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* her \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, shall \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w* her, because her \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w disallowed|strong="H5106"\w* her.

And if she had at all an \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, when she \w vowed|strong="H5088"\w*, or \w uttered|strong="H4008"\w* ought out of her \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, wherewith she \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* her \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*;\f + \fr 30.6 \ft she vowed: Heb. her vows were upon her\f*

And her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add it\add*, and held his \w peace|strong="H2790"\w* at her in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that he \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add it:\add* then her \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*, and her \w bonds|strong="H0632"\w* wherewith she \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* her \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*.

But if her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w disallowed|strong="H5106"\w* her on the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that he \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add it;\add* then he shall make her vow which she \w vowed|strong="H5088"\w*, and that which she \w uttered|strong="H4008"\w* with her \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, wherewith she \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* her \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, of none \w effect|strong="H6565"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w* her.

But every \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* of a \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, and of her that is \w divorced|strong="H1644"\w*, wherewith they have \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* their \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*, shall \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* against her.

And if she \w vowed|strong="H5087"\w* in her \w husband’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, or \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* her \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* by a \w bond|strong="H0632"\w* with an \w oath|strong="H7621"\w*;

And her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add it\add*, and held his \w peace|strong="H2790"\w* at her, \add and\add* \w disallowed|strong="H5106"\w* her not: then all her \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*, and every \w bond|strong="H0632"\w* wherewith she \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* her \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*.

But if her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* hath \w utterly|strong="H6565"\w* made them \w void|strong="H6565"\w* on the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* he \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add them; then\add* whatsoever \w proceeded|strong="H4161"\w* out of her \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* concerning her \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*, or concerning the \w bond|strong="H0632"\w* of her \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, shall not \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*: her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* hath made them \w void|strong="H6565"\w*; and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w* her.

Every \w vow|strong="H5088"\w*, and every \w binding|strong="H0632"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* to \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* may \w establish|strong="H6965"\w* it, or her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* may make it \w void|strong="H6565"\w*.

But if her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w altogether|strong="H2790"\w* hold his \w peace|strong="H2790"\w* at her from \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; then he \w establisheth|strong="H6965"\w* all her \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*, or all her \w bonds|strong="H0632"\w*, which \add are\add* upon her: he \w confirmeth|strong="H6965"\w* them, because he held his \w peace|strong="H2790"\w* at her in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that he \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add them\add*.

But if he shall any \w ways|strong="H6565"\w* make them \w void|strong="H6565"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that he hath \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add them;\add* then he shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* her \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

These \add are\add* the \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, between a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* and his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, between the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and his \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \add being yet\add* in her \w youth|strong="H5271"\w* in her \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.
